      • hasClickedBorder

        public boolean hasClickedBorder(double x,
                       double y,
                       boolean needSelected)
        Description copied from interface: EditableShape
        Checks if the specified point lies within a side of the shape
        Specified by:
        hasClickedBorder in interface EditableShape
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal co-ordinate of the point to check
        y - The vertical co-ordinate of the point to check
        needSelected - When the value of this param is true, the side must be selected.
        Returns:
        Returns true when a side of the shape is near the point defined by x and y.
